data.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - Zetsubou No Shima Zombies Map
data.detailed_description:
In this installment of the epic Zombies saga, the Origins characters head to 'Zetsubou No Shima', a tropical island overrun with mutated experiments that are hell-bent on destruction.

Get a bonus of 5 vials of Liquid Divinium to help in fighting off the undead.

This product only contains the Zombies map 'Zetsubou No Shima' and not the multiplayer maps from DLC 2. Call of Duty®: Black Ops III, which is sold separately, is required to play this content.

fullgame.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
